short_summary:
The British Army Training Unit Suffield (BATUS) requires Facility Maintenance and Support Services at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Suffield, Alberta.

The program will encompass preventative and corrective maintenance activities spanning a suite of hard and soft services.

The full inspection, testing, maintenance, and repair scope of services will be applied to all BATUS buildings at CFB Suffield, which comprises 275 buildings/facilities with an approximate gross total floor space of 110,594m2.
description:
Advance Procurement NoticeBATUS Buildings Facilities Maintenance Support ServicesCFB Suffield, Alberta(with Security Requirements)

Purpose of this Advance Procurement Notice

This is not a bid solicitation. This is an advance notice of a potential contract with anticipated security requirements to provide interested contractors an opportunity to begin the sponsorship request process for potentially obtaining the required security clearance that is anticipated. Note that there is no guarantee that this contract will proceed or that any security clearance(s) will be granted under the sponsorship process in a timely fashion or otherwise.

Description of the Project and Services

The British Army Training Unit Suffield (BATUS) requires Facility Maintenance and Support Services at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Suffield, Alberta.
